info.name: OpenSubtitles dark + fancy
info.description:
Besides making opensubtitles.org dark, it applies numerous improvements:
  • â€¢ Font with better legibility (Roboto)
  • â€¢ Removed annoying/unnecessary elements
  • â€¢ Supports background images (click CUSTOMIZE SETTINGS) and select one)
  • â€¢ Links are underlined only while hovered
  • â€¢ Icons with poor transparency are rounded or inverted for good legibility on dark ground
  • â€¢ Increased whitespace in tables, because they looked very squashed.
info.additionalInfo: Advice:: Increase zoom to 120% - 130% for better legibility! (Ctrl +) I made this style because I hate to open a dazzling bright website after a movie with dimmed lights. I hope you find this style useful, too. Please note that I don't have an opensubtitles account, so there might be bugs while you're logged in. Bug found? Please don't hesitate to send me a message.
